response.overview: A weary veteran pastor, known for his quiet wisdom and steady compassion, crosses paths with a deeply troubled man whose life is unraveling. As the pastor guides him through honest conversations, hard truths, and moments of unexpected grace, the two form an unlikely bond. Together, they confront the wounds of the past, searching for forgiveness, healing, and a sense of peace neither realized they still needed.
response.title: Jacob A. Miller's The Parish
